title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 6
description: In this chapter, there is more travel through the Dakotas, a brief exploration of Chris and of John’s inability to relate to motorcycle maintenance, We learn a little more about the mysterious Phaedrus, we go into more depth about the Classic/Romantic split, and in doing so begin to​ enter Phaedrus’ world. We also explore how systems are divided up and analyzed,  and in doing that, introduce the concept of the analytic knife with a demonstration, and begin to discuss how Phaedrus uses it.
